user_query: boss and makes the executive decision to dispose of her as she mothers Reynolds it's the way she knows he needs back to Alma we see her fall into the same trap of replacement and we expect the same outcome as that opening sequence as told us but it's her stubbornness it's her power of will is her refusal to settle that keeps the relationship off-balance enough not to fall into that normal cycle early on she is presented as passive and swept off her feet but she's much more than that in fact I think her first attempt to overpower him before the poison was through manipulation before the midpoint when the curse beginning to break Reynolds primary love is his work and Alma is well aware of this as she attempts to win him over in this scene by helping him retrieve his dress because of this obvious disrespect she shows us how much she cares and that she is in his corner because he could no longer behave like this and they just buy the house of Woodcock leading us to the first onscreen kiss that we see between them coming strongly from Reynolds this time however despite the seeming success she goes one step too far and tells him that she loves him only to be met with a silent exhale the following scene of the porch has nothing to do with the plot but PTA cleverly uses the short seemingly meaningless scenes to act as a continuation an extension of the emotional beat from the scene before giving the appearance of love again but leaving the crashing of true love unanswered Reynolds

entities.entity_description: Reynolds는 영화의 남성 주인공으로, 일에 대한 사랑이 주된 관심사이며 Alma와의 관계에서 감정적으로 복잡한 모습을 보이는 인물이다
Alma는 영화의 여성 주인공으로, 처음에는 수동적으로 보이지만 강한 의지와 고집으로 Reynolds와의 관계를 유지하려 하며, 독을 사용하기 전에 조종을 통해 그를 제압하려 시도하는 인물이다
PTA는 영화 감독으로, 짧고 무의미해 보이는 장면들을 이전 장면의 감정적 비트의 연장선으로 활용하는 연출 기법을 사용한다
House of Woodcock는 Reynolds와 Alma의 관계가 전개되는 배경이 되는 영화 작품이다

relationships.relationship_description: Alma는 Reynolds와 연인 관계이며, 그를 제압하고 사랑을 얻기 위해 다양한 시도를 한다
Reynolds는 Alma에게 첫 키스를 하지만 그녀의 사랑 고백에는 침묵으로 반응한다
Alma는 House of Woodcock의 주요 등장인물이다
Reynolds는 House of Woodcock의 주요 등장인물이다
PTA는 House of Woodcock를 연출한 감독이다

HOUSE OF WOODCOCK.description: HOUSE OF WOODCOCK -> HOUSE OF WOODCOCK
